scripts.quick-clean: curl -s -X POST http://localhost:4010/api/v2/clone -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"sessionId":"'$npm_config_id'","toolRemoval":"100","thinkingRemoval":"100"}' | node -e "const d=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0,'utf8')); if(d.success){const id=d.outputPath.split('/').pop().replace('.jsonl',''); console.log('claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --resume '+id)}else{console.log('Error: '+(d.error||'unknown'))}"
scripts.c7:search: f() { curl -s "https://context7.com/api/v2/search?query=$1" -H "Authorization: Bearer $CONTEXT7_API_KEY" | jq '.results[:5] | .[] | {id, title, description}'; }; f
